name: textFont()
content:
Sets the current font.

This font will be used in all subsequent calls to `text()`. The default font is Arial. The parameter must be a string representing a web safe font. See [W3 Schools - Web Safe Fonts](https://www.w3schools.com/cssref/css_websafe_fonts.asp)

Text that does not fit completely within the display area will not be drawn or seen.

palette_params.name: font
palette_params.description: A string representing a web safe font.

return_value: No return value. Changes future text output to the display only.
